name: Flag Media
description: FLAG is the official token of Flag Media. Flag Media is the parent company of CryptoTimesRegister.com, GlobalBusinessDaily.com, PRDailyWire.com, CEOExtra.com, EmpireStories.com, and other online newspapers and magazines. Flag Media also has a very large partner network and is building the Flag Media Mall, a place where vendors can meet buyers and offer products, services, gifts cards, and plan events using FLAG tokens. With only 8 million tokens in the circulating supply, the demand for FLAG will remain high.
